sentences.english: Your willingness to sacrifice countless late nights consoling them?
sentences.chinese: 或者是因爲你願意花費無數的夜晚去安慰他們？

sentences.english: This pizza parlor offers free delivery on weeknights.
sentences.chinese: 披薩店在工作日夜晚提供免費外送服務。

sentences.english: I will leave aside, for the moment, what happens on Friday and Saturday nights.
sentences.chinese: 咱們暫時不要考慮，星期五，星期六的夜晚。

sentences.english: What should you do then on those sleepless nights?
sentences.chinese: 那麼你在睡不着的夜晚幹什麼纔好呢？
夜晚的污染程度則會下降。

sentences.english: We're gonna get together go to the wonderful light show on the mid-autumn day.
sentences.chinese: 在中秋那天夜晚，我們將一起去看燈會。

sentences.english: That's because on most nights, we dream.
sentences.chinese: 這是因爲在大多數的夜晚，我們都作夢。

sentences.english: On the night side of Saturn, the planet casts a dark shadow over its rings.
sentences.chinese: 土星的黝黑陰影投影在夜晚一側的土星環上。

sentences.english: Ipanema Beach in Rio De Janeiro, Brazil, at night.
sentences.chinese: 巴西里約熱內盧的伊帕內瑪海灘的夜晚。

sentences.english: Without the torment of the night's untruth.
sentences.chinese: 而不需面對夜晚虛僞的折磨。

sentences.english: He would be there for you , every day and every night.
sentences.chinese: 每一個白天，夜晚，他都陪着你。

sentences.english: My skin crawled when I heard a sudden shriek in the dead of night.
sentences.chinese: 夜晚萬籟俱寂時突然聽到一聲尖叫，嚇得我汗毛直豎。

sentences.english: I shiver a little, with the evening.
sentences.chinese: 這個夜晚讓我有些顫抖。

sentences.english: In this lamp the next night, I hold a pen in the soft music.
sentences.chinese: 在這個檯燈下的夜晚，我握筆在輕柔的音樂中。

sentences.english: Isn't that fun? I enjoy lying on the field at night and looking up at the starry sky.
sentences.chinese: 馬可大哥喜歡夜晚時分躺在營地上，看著滿天星斗。

sentences.english: Death arrived at his house on the night of his demise.
sentences.chinese: 在男人即將死去的那個夜晚，死神來到了他的屋子。

definition: in the evening/when night falls/towards evening/at night fall/at dusk
time/period during the day/one of the 12 two-hour periods enumerated by the earthly branches 地支
early evening when lanterns are first lit
night scene/the dim light of night
